1.text: Fill a medium sized bowl with cold water.

2.text: Set the bundle of cilantro in a colander.

3.text: Shake the colander with the cilantro bundle well until all of the excess water exits the colander.

4.text: Look through the cilantro for any discolored or wilted cilantro leaves.

5.text: Decide how much of the stems you want to keep.

6.text: Remove however much of the stems you wish.

7.text: Chop the bundle of cilantro in half, using the middle as a guideline.

9.text: Decide how finely chopped you want your cilantro.

10.text: Fold the bunch of cilantro leaves in half and place them on the cutting board.
